title: Language Education Design Integrating Tablet-Based Interactive Response Systems (IRS) and Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Tablet-based IRS (Interactive Response System) language education project design and implementation for elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement real-time interactive language activities using tablet-based IRS (Interactive Response Systems).
Learners analyze differences in learning effectiveness based on feedback types (KCR, KR, reinforced KCR) and select context-appropriate feedback.
Learners can develop and evaluate strategies to enhance engagement and interest through IRS in a Project-Based Learning (PBL) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
